version_description: Bug fixes and performance optimization

- Manage multiple accounts: Enroll and manage all your Globe At Home Broadband Postpaid and Prepaid Wifi accounts
- Custom data alerts: Get timely notification about your remaining data
minor bug fix

- Minor Enhancements

- Fixed a few bugs to improve your overall experience.
- To continue using the app and view account info correctly, app users need to update to the latest version.
- Once updated, simply re-validate your Globe At Home accounts in the app again to start using.
- Bug fixes.
- New Enhancements and Bug Fixes
- Minor Enhancements

- Track your Globe At Home repairman's location and easily monitor repair progress of your plan through the app, now available on selected areas.
- Minor bug fixes.
- App support for iOS 11 and iPhone X
- Minor bug fix

- Postpaid customers can now view and download their current e-bill directly from the app
- Prepaid customers now have the option to charge their data promos directly to their Prepaid Home WiFi
- Bug fixes were done to address app reliability issues.
- Bug fixes were done to improve your overall experience with the app

- Now you can have a more detailed view of your data allowance in the dashboard.
- Other UI improvements

- We made minor improvements to the UI for you
- You can now use your Prepaid modem’s load to subscribe to HomeSURF 15
- We made a few minor improvements to improve your experience. Hope you like it!
We made improvements to give you a more wonderful experience.
- We’ve made it easier for you to verify your Prepaid Wifi. Hope you like it!
- We did some bug fixes to make the app more reliable for you! :)
- We've implemented some tweaks and fixes for better app performance and user interface design.
- We fixed some bugs and packed some great stuff in this release.
- Thank you for using Globe At Home! This update includes improvements to create a better customer experience and enhancements on our Help & Support page.
- Enhancement on help and support
- Celebrate the holiday season with Globe
- minor bug fixes

Get fresh features, offers for Prepaid, Help & Support tips and how-tos that will bring your connection to a #AHomeNewLevel #BestAtHome

Get fresh and exciting features such as:
- New experience in paying your postpaid bills
- Stay tuned for new plan upgrade offers

It will surely bring your connection to a #AHomeNewLevel #BestAtHome

Get fresh and exciting features such as:
- Experience the new and improved Inbox
- Included additional support for Globe At Home Prepaid Wifi Modem
- Bug fixes

It will surely bring your connection to a #AHomeNewLevel #BestAtHome

What's New

Get fresh and exciting features such as:
- Activation and cancellation for selected content partners
- Get free vouchers from new partners for every HomeSurf subscription except HS15.

It will surely bring your connection to a #AHomeNewLevel #BestAtHome

Shout out to loyal customers! You get to play in-app game, get gift/s and give back to the community! Bring #BestAtHome experience to #AHomeNewLevel.

We also extended our Prepaid WiFi promo period, fixed buttons for easy management and conserved our system event logs for security.

Shout out to loyal customers! You get to play in-app game, get gift/s and give back to the community! Bring #BestAtHome experience to #AHomeNewLevel.

We also extended our Prepaid WiFi promo period, fixed buttons for easy management and conserved our system event logs for security.

And to stay current, we updated few images and FAQs for clearer communication.

We've made changes to improve your Globe At Home app.

Here are the latest updates included in this version:
- The App is now free from data charges. We'll let you know if you're leaving the free data use section.
- Enhancements in plan upgrade request
- Improved app interface
- Fixed main page interface when you switch accounts.

We’re constantly updating the app so we can make sure it works better for you.

This version includes the following:
-Several maintenance fixes to support 8-digit landline changes
-Improved carousel dynamics
-Updated redeemable offers information
-Added new personalised offers for Home Prepaid Subscribers

Thanks for your continued use of Globe At Home App. More exciting features coming soon.

What's new:
We updated the app every few weeks to keep it fresh and updated. Our latest version contains performance enhancements to our payment system and content management tool, not to mention more exciting seasonal campaigns and of course bug fixes.
- We heard you and we're working to improve the app. We've cleaned up bugs to reduce app crashes for a smoother experience.
NEW EXCITING THINGS AWAIT. Fixed a few bugs, added some new in-app exclusive features, enhanced existing ones. Update your app and get ready for a #BestAtHome #AHomeNewLevel experience.

It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas, even in our Globe at Home app! We’ve dressed up our app in time for Christmas, and prepared lots of goodies for you!

We’ve also added new exciting promos this release, routine enhancements and bug fixes.

Gong Xi Fa Cai! New year, new promos and benefits! We've update the app so you can enjoy the following features:
-Purchase entertainment subscriptions on your Home Prepaid Wifi to watch your favorite K-Dramas!
-Added more entertainment subscriptions for Globe At Home Postpaid
-Chinese New Year promo for a chance to win a trip to Taiwan
-Additional security enhancements

- Support for new HPW modem
- Enhancement of existing features for Volume Boost and Help & Support section
- Bug fixes

Thanks for choosing Globe At Home! This release contains support for new Home Prepaid WiFi modems and SIM expiry notifications, enhancement of existing features and spiels for Content Management and upgrade services, as well as stability and performance improvements for:
•Landline number display fix
•Multiple page-handling
•Volume Boost variant-maintenance
•Payment handling upkeep

We are constantly updating Globe At Home App to provide you with a better experience.

This version includes minor fixes and enhancements like overlapping issues and missing details.

We're excited to introduce GCash mode of payment for Home Prepaid Wifi HomeSURF and GoSURF and allow multiple volume boost purchase for Postpaid customers.

To accommodate your concerns and suggestions, we have also added a feature that will help you email us your concerns through the app so you can conveniently let us know how we can help.

This update also includes application analytics, maintenance and clean up to serve you better!

We've updated our Globe At Home app to a better version. For Home Prepaid WiFi customers, you'll be able to load promos via GCash and getting more data will now be so much convenient. For our Postpaid Broadband customers, getting more data, upgrading your plan as well as getting help will now be so much easier!

This update also includes feature enhancements and tools maintenance.

We've updated Globe At Home app to an improved version!

In this release, we've included:

1. Security enhancements on the View Bill feature.
2. Improved experience for Home Prepaid WiFi customers when registering with multiple devices.
3. Critical fixes for One-Time Passwords.
4. Enhanced experience for customers who need to send their concerns or request for repair services.

This release also includes back-end updates for analytics that will help us further improve the app.

We've updated Globe At Home app to an improved version!

In this release we've included:

1. Exciting new promos and offers
2. Security enhancements
3. Improved user experience for the following features:
- GCash as mode of payment
- Upgrade Plan
- Data Usage Display
- Device Add-ons
- Get More Data

Download our latest update for a new and improved version of the Globe At Home app!

In this release, we've included:

- Exciting new promos and offers
- A new feature to help you track your Globe technician for Installation, Migration and Repair
- Improved experience for Postpaid subscribers when purchasing Volume Boost and upgrading plans
- Better features but smaller app size

...and some minor fixes for a better user experience!

Download our latest update for a new and improved version of the Globe At Home app!

In this release, we've included:

- Exciting new promos and offers
- Reintroduction of security questions for Postpaid subscribers to provide smooth and safe access to the application
- Improved experience for Postpaid subscribers when requesting for plan upgrade or transfer of location
- Integration with Globe's online helpdesk

...and some minor fixes for a better user experience!

We've updated the Globe At Home app for you!

In this release, we've included new features to...
- help you troubleshoot connectivity of your Home Prepaid WiFi
- enable more entry points for customer feedback

...and minor fixes for a better user experience!

What's New:

In this release, we've included:

Exciting new promos, offers, and games just in time for the holiday season
Faster processing of requests for postpaid subscribers when getting a plan upgrade
More freebies for plan upgrades
Enhanced security features
Better experience when requesting for repair
Purchase of new devices straight from the Globe At Home app

...and some minor fixes for a better user experience!

- New prepaid promo Surf4All, where you can load a promo for your home prepaid wifi and share it with your Globe mobile numbers, too!
- Monitor and manage your Surf4All member's data limit and add or remove member.
